publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1007 Mr Sam Galbraith: Early Education and Childcareâ€”That the Parliament supports the progress that the Executive has made towards the twin goals of free pre-school education and affordable, accessible, quality childcare in every locality and welcomes the additional resources allocated to local authorities and other bodies in order to make further progress with these objectives.
